foci.name: Alert
foci.level_1: Always act first in surprise rounds. Gain Notice as a bonus skill.
foci.level_2: Enemies never surprise you. +2 on initiative rolls.

foci.name: Arcane Mind
foci.level_1: Pick mental attribute; modifier +1 (max +3). Can take multiple times for different attributes

foci.name: Arcane Physique
foci.level_1: Pick physical attribute; modifier +1 (max +3). Can take multiple times for different attributes

foci.name: Armored Technique
foci.level_1: Cast spells in street/combat armor (Enc ≤1) or powered armor (Enc 0)
foci.level_2: Cast spells regardless of armor bulk

foci.name: Armsman
foci.level_1: Gain Stab or Shoot as a bonus skill. +1 to hit with one type of weapon.
foci.level_2: +1 damage with your chosen weapon type.

foci.name: Assassin
foci.level_1: Gain Sneak as bonus skill. +2 damage when attacking unaware targets.
foci.level_2: +4 damage vs unaware targets. Attacks ignore up to 4 points of armor.

foci.name: Authority
foci.level_1: Gain Lead as a bonus skill. Followers gain +1 to morale saves.
foci.level_2: Command respect. Strangers tend to obey your orders.

foci.name: Blade Ward
foci.level_1: After 15min prep, nominate weapon type. Reduce damage by 2/level (min 0) from that weapon
foci.level_2: Immune to non-magical nominated weapons. Magical damage reduced as level 1. Ward 2 weapons at 7th level

foci.name: Close Combatant
foci.level_1: +2 damage with melee weapons. Gain Punch or Stab as bonus skill.
foci.level_2: Can use Shock damage even on targets normally immune to it.

foci.name: Compelling Gaze
foci.level_1: 1 System Strain + Main Action: implant suggestion in target meeting your gaze (Mental save if not verbalized)
foci.level_2: +1 System Strain to paralyze target for scene (Mental save -2). Breaks if harm intended

foci.name: Connected
foci.level_1: Gain Connect as bonus skill. Have useful contacts in most civilized locations.
foci.level_2: Contacts are exceptionally helpful and well-placed.

foci.name: Cross-Disciplinary Study
foci.level_1: Learn one spell from another tradition of any level you can cast. Can change once per level
foci.level_2: Learn one spell per spell level you can cast from other traditions. Can change each once per level

foci.name: Die Hard
foci.level_1: Gain +2 maximum hit points per character level.
foci.level_2: Can survive one attack that would kill you, dropping to 1 HP instead.

foci.name: Eldritch Battery
foci.level_1: Fuel ally's spell once per day (no resource cost to caster)
foci.level_2: Fuel 1 + max(CON, WIS mod) spells/day. Extra spells deal 1d6 per 2 spell levels. Can't use if below 1 HP

foci.name: Elemental Warrior
foci.level_1: Choose energy type. Resist 2 HP/level/round. Add skill to damage (Stab/Punch for melee, Shoot for ranged). Can fire as TL2 rifle
foci.level_2: Main Action + 1 System Strain: 2d6 + level Heavy damage in radius up to 1m/level within 30m (Evasion save)

foci.name: Ghost Tech
foci.level_1: Conjure TL4 tech (non-weapon/armor) as Main Action. Have up to level items at once. Inexhaustible power
foci.level_2: Conjure as On Turn. Once per session: 1 System Strain for specialized tech, roll skill check twice

foci.name: Gunslinger
foci.level_1: Gain Shoot as a bonus skill. Can draw and reload weapons instantly.
foci.level_2: +2 to hit with ranged weapons at 30 feet or closer.

foci.name: Hacker
foci.level_1: Gain Program as a bonus skill. Can hack systems in half the time.
foci.level_2: Can attempt to hack even extremely secured systems.

foci.name: Healer
foci.level_1: Gain Know as a bonus skill. Heal +2 HP when providing medical care.
foci.level_2: Can stabilize dying characters as a move action.

foci.name: Henchkeeper
foci.level_1: Gain Lead as bonus skill. Can hire henchmen for half the normal cost.
foci.level_2: Henchmen are exceptionally loyal and capable. +2 to their morale.

foci.name: Imprinted Spell
foci.level_1: Imprint one spell to cast in place of equal/higher level spell slot. Change once per level
foci.level_2: Change imprinted spell once per day during preparation

foci.name: Initiate of Healing
foci.level_1: Expend spell slot to heal visible ally within 30m for 1d6/level + Cast Magic skill
foci.level_2: Touch to heal 1d6 per 3 levels (rounded up), adds 1 System Strain. Once per hour per target

foci.name: Ironhide
foci.level_1: Gain Exert as a bonus skill. Innate AC 15 without armor.
foci.level_2: Innate AC becomes 16. Ignore 1 point of damage from attacks.

foci.name: Limited Study
foci.level_1: Learn one spell (level ≤ your level/2). Cast once per day, can cast in armor. Change once per level
foci.level_2: Learn second spell (level ≤ your level/2). Cast each once per day

foci.name: Mageblade
foci.level_1: Manifest 1d10+1 weapon (any attribute mod, +Stab skill). Shock 2/AC 15. 100m range. Silent ranged option
foci.level_2: At 1st and each odd level: +1 hit/dmg (max +3), invisible, Shock AC +2 (max 21), Shock dmg +2 (max 6), or 1km range

foci.name: Maskwalker
foci.level_1: Main Action: alter appearance and attuned gear. Physical changes pass DNA tests. +1 System Strain for specific person mimicry
foci.level_2: +1 System Strain for perfect imposture with language/social skills. Wis/Connect DC 9 to remember facts (+3 for secrets)

foci.name: Masterful Expertise
foci.level_1: Pick one non-combat skill. Impossible tasks with this skill become merely difficult.
foci.level_2: With your chosen skill, you can accomplish legendary feats.

foci.name: Occult Healer
foci.level_1: Touch + Main Action: stabilize dying (+1 System Strain) or heal 1d6 (+1 System Strain). Continue healing 1d6/round up to level rounds total
foci.level_2: Ranged healing within 30m. Heal 2d6/round

foci.name: Occult Resilience
foci.level_1: Don't eat, drink, sleep, breathe. Survive vacuum/hostile environments as vacc suit. Immune to gaseous toxins
foci.level_2: Immune to all toxins/diseases. Auto-stabilize at 0 HP, recover 1 HP in 1 hour. 1 HP/hour regeneration. Physical save vs instant death

foci.name: Petty Sorceries
foci.level_1: Produce minor magical effects freely for flavor. Concretely useful once per session

foci.name: Probability Manipulator
foci.level_1: Once per scene, force a reroll of any die roll you can see.
foci.level_2: Can use probability manipulation twice per scene.

foci.name: Psychic Synergy
foci.level_1: Once per day, trade Psychic Effort for spell or vice versa. Restore Effort by trading spell slot
foci.level_2: Convert power twice per day

foci.name: Psychic Training
foci.level_1: Gain Psychic skill at level 0 and one psychic discipline.
foci.level_2: Gain another psychic discipline.

foci.name: Reality Sculptor
foci.level_1: Can subtly manipulate reality within 10 meters once per scene.
foci.level_2: Reality manipulation has stronger effects and longer duration.

foci.name: Savage Sorcery
foci.level_1: Magic bolt (1d8 + level, 100m range, +Cast Magic to hit). +1 damage per die on damaging spells
foci.level_2: Convert spell to raw damage: 1d6+1 per spell level to single target within 100m

foci.name: Shadow Companion
foci.level_1: Shadow with 5 + 2×level HP, +level hit bonus, 1d10 melee dmg, AC 15, Morale 12, Save 16-level, +1 to nature skills. 100m range
foci.level_2: Each odd level: communicate with others, normal form, +1 HP/level (max +2), AC +2 (max 21), Shock 3/AC 15, +1 skill (max +2), flight 2×speed, carry level Enc when dismissed, suicidally obedient, or 1d6+4 melee dmg

foci.name: Shocking Assault
foci.level_1: Can use Shock damage against targets normally immune (like powered armor).
foci.level_2: Roll Shock damage twice and take the better result.

foci.name: Sniper
foci.level_1: Gain Shoot as bonus skill. No penalty for firing at long range.
foci.level_2: +2 damage when firing from a prepared position.

foci.name: Soul Shield
foci.level_1: Once/day Instant: auto-succeed failed save vs magic. Always aware of magic targeted at you
foci.level_2: Roll twice on saves vs magic. Once/day Instant: resist lethal/unacceptable magic effect (drop to 1 HP)

foci.name: Specialist
foci.level_1: Pick a non-combat, non-psychic skill. Gain it as a bonus skill. Roll 3d6 and drop lowest die for checks with this skill.
foci.level_2: Roll 4d6 drop lowest for checks with your specialist skill.

foci.name: Starfarer
foci.level_1: Gain Pilot as a bonus skill. Gain +1 to all skill checks related to spacecraft.
foci.level_2: Can plot jumps in half the time. Navigate hazards with ease.

foci.name: Supernal Mobility
foci.level_1: Leap up to movement distance (horizontal/vertical), disengage freely. Travel on walls/ceilings. Immune to <30m falls
foci.level_2: Choose: fly at normal speed OR teleport (Move action) to visible location within movement range

foci.name: Tech Specialist
foci.level_1: Gain Fix or Program as bonus skill. +2 to related skill checks.
foci.level_2: Can interface directly with computers using cybernetics or psionic link.

foci.name: Tinker
foci.level_1: Gain Fix as a bonus skill. Can jury-rig broken tech to work temporarily.
foci.level_2: Repairs take half the time. Can create improvised gadgets.

foci.name: Unarmed Combatant
foci.level_1: Gain Punch as a bonus skill. Unarmed attacks deal 1d8 damage.
foci.level_2: Unarmed attacks deal 1d10 damage. Can punch targets in powered armor.

foci.name: Vast Erudition
foci.level_1: Know all level-1 Arcanist spells. Learn 4 new spells per level instead of 2
foci.level_2: Know all Arcanist spells below max level you can cast

foci.name: Void Dancer
foci.level_1: Can survive in vacuum for 1 hour without protection. Move freely in zero-G.
foci.level_2: Immune to environmental hazards of space. Can sense spatial distortions.

foci.name: Wanderer
foci.level_1: Gain Survive as a bonus skill. Can always find food and shelter in wilderness.
foci.level_2: Track any creature. Navigate without tools. Rarely get lost.

foci.name: War Caster
foci.level_1: Physical save to avoid losing spell when injured. Don't lose spell slot on interruption
foci.level_2: Accept 2×spell level damage to continue casting when interrupted

foci.name: Waymaker
foci.level_1: Know exact location and bearing. Eidetic path memory. 1 System Strain to open/unlock barrier for 1 round/level
foci.level_2: 2 System Strain On Turn: open rift to visible or previously occupied location (10m/level range) for 1 round/level

foci.name: Weapon Unity
foci.level_1: Pick attribute; use its modifier for all weapons
foci.level_2: Gain Fight skill at highest combat skill level. Use Fight for all combat. Refund other combat skills

foci.name: Witchfinder
foci.level_1: Know Magic bonus skill. See/hear magic. Get sentence description of magical intent. Detection check vs concealed magic
foci.level_2: Main Action + 1 System Strain: Cha or Wis/Know Magic vs DC 7 + caster's Cast Magic to dispel (one attempt only)
